title: Assembly Basis
description: Basis ties the release to a particular moment, existing release, or another release.

brew_event.description: A Brew event that ties the release to a particular moment. Images and rpms will be assembled relative to this basis event.

time.description: A datetime value in ISO 8601 format that ties the release to a particular moment. Similar to brew_event. Images and rpms will be assembled relative to this moment.

assembly.description: The parent assembly to inherit from

patch_version.description: For a custom release, explicitly set the patch version

hotfix_previous_assembly.description: For a hotfix release, set previous assembly from which patch version will be inferred

reference_releases.title: Reference releases
reference_releases.description: Indicates this release should be assembled with specified existing release images
